message:
SYSTEM: NeOn_2007_D5.3.1.pdf: Página 87
D5.3.1 NeOn Development Process and Ontology Life Cycle 
Page 87 of 111 
Activity 
Natural Language Questions 
Ontology 
Specialization 
Do you want to extend your current ontology network by adding 
new concepts “in a vertical way/direction” with the aim of 
increasing the specialization of it? 
 
sc
sc
sc
sc
sc
sc
 
(cf. Ontology Extension) 
Ontology 
Summarization 
Do you want to provide an abstract of your ontology network in 
which you may include an extract of the highest level of the 
ontology hierarchy, or a summary of the Ontology Specification, or 
maybe a set of metadata? 
Ontology Translation 
Do you want to change the representation formalism (description 
logic, frames, rules, etc.) or language (RDF(S), OWL, etc.) of your 
ontology network? 
Ontology Update 
Are you going to carry out minor changes in your ontology network 
that do not imply putting out a new version of it? 
 
Figure 37 shows the informal decision tree for obtaining the table of selected activities.
